Please use the guided feature form at `.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/feature_request.yml` whenever possible.
If you cannot use the form, include:

- Problem statement and context
- Proposed solution
- Alternatives considered
- Use cases and expected impact
- Willingness to contribute (implementation, testing, docs)
